creator: ABB Information Systems AG
descriptionHtml:
Experience the door communication of your Welcome system on your smartphone or tablet!
Never miss a door call. With the Welcome app all calls are transferred directly to your mobile device. You can see and hear who is at your door via Wi-Fi network or remotely on 3G/ 4G (or higher) networks.
Missed visitors are recorded with picture and date and can be called up at any time later.

Simply connect the app to your Welcome system via the myABB-LivingSpace account. Information about the configuration of your IP-Gateway is shown in user manual.
descriptionShort: Experience the door communication of your Welcome system on your smartphone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1.Update for ABB-Welcome door entry system:
* support to pair with 4.3 WiFi video indoor station and configure the 4.3 WiFi indoor station
* support to accept the call, release the door, make surveillance, control switch actuator
* support to view history lists
2.Update for ABB-AccessControl system
* support to pair with SmartAP Pro
* support to control smart cylinders
3.Update for ABB-VideoControl system
* support to pair with ABB IP cameras
* support to make surveillance to IP cameras

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Update for ABB-Welcome IP door entry system:
• Support QR code unlock.
• Support manage PIN code

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New icon design
- Support configuration of Welcome 4.3 WiFi indoor station parameters without internet connection
- Bug fix and general stability improvements

Improvements in this version
- Switching between horizontal and vertical view on a tablet is now possible
- Correct picture for an Outdoor Station
- Translation improvements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Login on the local Wi-Fi with the MyBuilding portal works again.
When a mobile device was connected to a Wi-Fi network, login challenges with the MyBuilding portal sometimes occurred on Android 9, 10 or 11.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Communication on the local Wi-Fi with the MyBuilding portal works stable again.
When a mobile device was connected to a Wi-Fi network, sometimes the communication with the MyBuilding portal was unstable.
This occurred on different Android Versions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Stay in touch with us using our new feedback feature.
The Welcome Team would like to hear your opinion. Sharing your experience and ideas will help us to improve the App to fit even better to you.
* We improved the commissioning process for the Video Indoor Station 4.3 Wifi.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The Wifi initial startup under Android 11 for the Video Indoor Station 4.3 Wifi has been improved.
After the Indoor station has been configured with the local wifi network via the Welcome app and the smartphone connects to the local WLAN again, there were connection difficulties to the indoor station. This behavior has been improved

descriptionShort: Experience the door communication of your Welcome system on your smartphone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* We've improved the way the Welcome app launches to give you faster access.
* [Welcome IP] Generate a QR code via the Welcome app to enable guests to open the door via the Outdoor Station touch 5. For more information on configuring the function, see to.abb/OLdyIw92 (chapter 9.5).
* With the new log function, Welcome App activities can be recorded if required. The result can then be made available to Technical Support, e.g. for error analysis.

descriptionShort: Experience the door communication of your Welcome system on your smartphone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* We improved the commissioning process for pairing the Welcome App with the Video Indoor Station 4.3 Wifi.
* During the Paring process the Welcome App send the myBuildings Portal credentials automatically to the Video Indoor Station 4.3 Wifi.

descriptionShort: Experience the door communication of your Welcome system on your smartphone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- In the "Notifications & Sounds" settings menu, the "Quiet times" option can now be activated. This allows you to set when the Welcome app should not display notifications about incoming door calls.
- Integration of Help Center (BETA)
- Welcome switch actuators can be placed as favorites
- Call answering type can now be changed from sliding to pressing in the Notifications & Sounds menu.
- The light control during a door call returns a visual feedback

descriptionShort: Experience the door communication of your Welcome system on your smartphone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• We have improved the Welcome app in combination with Android battery
optimization. You will now be asked if you want to turn on or off battery
optimization for the Welcome app. It is mandatory to turn off Android
battery optimization for the Welcome app to receive push notifications for
incoming calls.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improving quality and stability during an incoming call by updating to the latest core library

descriptionShort: Experience the door communication of your Welcome system on your smartphone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• It is now possible to log in to the Welcome App without selecting a system.
• We have identified and resolved an issue where incoming door calls would still appear even if a user's phone was set to Do Not Disturb mode.
• Supporting the ABB _PLUS and _ONE subscription models. User can now choose from additional subscription options tailored to their needs, ensuring a more personalized and seamless experience.
• Improved stability: Several bug fixes implemented for a smoother user experience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1, Support new device: IP Touch Lite 7”
2, Add a new push-notification: SOS
3, Combine two entries in Pair Devices IP Gateway/Touch Panel and WiFi indoor station into Panels
4, Support new device: IP Touch 7 & 10
5, Upgrade FCM SDK. Fix the issue which in some phone when app in background, it will crash when receive notification

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have noticed that the volume of the outdoor station sometimes arrives very quietly at the indoor station. This problem was resolved with the last software update.
